channel.title: Twitter / seansan
channel.description: Twitter updates from Sean Ho / seansan.

item.title: seansan: Win8 RP and http://t.co/oTceKM1U 2012 RC are so much smoother than previous versions. Less painful developing metro app.
item.description: seansan: Win8 RP and http://t.co/oTceKM1U 2012 RC are so much smoother than previous versions. Less painful developing metro app.

item.title: seansan: RT @woodhull: Also, a ghetto. No good ways to use Sass/Less except a commercial visual studio plugin or node.js via IPC.
item.description: seansan: RT @woodhull: Also, a ghetto. No good ways to use Sass/Less except a commercial visual studio plugin or node.js via IPC.

item.title: seansan: @waterlou @siuying I feel like ORM is an overkill on mobile client, a client document store works better, esp for data consumption
item.description: seansan: @waterlou @siuying I feel like ORM is an overkill on mobile client, a client document store works better, esp for data consumption

item.title: seansan: A classic humor movie lead by Steve Ballmer RT @hackernewsbot: Windows Live is dead... http://t.co/EXQGWyJS

item.title: seansan: @Justin_Chow 半年啦，下次又可以由頭睇過。
